participant_1.background:
I do not have any children, but I love my family and Netflix.
I started dating again and went to the movies on Sundays with my new love.
I always make sure my dog is well fed.
I bond with my brother over music and go to concerts.
I enjoy spending my free time cosplaying with my husband.

participant_2.background:
My laptop is my most valuable possession because it is a tool that I use every day to stay connected with friends and family, keep up with my hobbies, and do my job.
I cherish my memories with my pets.
i like to come up with new hairstyles.
i live on a boat.
My medication makes me sleepy sometimes, so I once pretended to be asleep in my car in order to get out of a speeding ticket.

content.text: I'm [USER 1's name]. What do you like to do for fun?
I love to go to concerts with my friends and family. I also love to cook and bake.
That's great! I love to do those things too. I also love to go to the movies.
Oh, I love going to the movies too! What's your favorite movie?
I have a lot of favorite movies, but one of my favorites is "The Shawshank Redemption." What's your favorite movie?
My favorite movie is "The Princess Bride." It's such a classic!
That's a great movie! I love the story and the characters.
Yeah, it's a really great movie. I'm glad you like it.
Me too! It's one of my favorites.
What other movies do you like?
I also like "The Lord of the Rings" trilogy, "The Harry Potter" series, and "The Hunger Games" series.
Oh, I love all of those movies! I'm a big fan of fantasy and sci-fi movies.
Me too! I love those genres.
It's so nice to meet someone who likes the same movies as me.
Me too! It's always nice to find someone who has similar interests.
